name: StikJIT Repository
subtitle: AltStore/SideStore compatible source repository for StikJIT.
description: An on-device JIT enabler for iOS versions 17.4+ (excluding iOS 18.4 beta 1), powered by idevice.

apps.name: StikJIT
apps.subtitle: An on-device JIT enabler for iOS versions 17.4+ (excluding iOS 18.4 beta 1), powered by idevice.
apps.versionDescription:
What's Changed
* Add check if 17.4+ is installed by @C4ndyF1sh in https://github.com/0-Blu/StikJIT/pull/128
* Actually fix the -17 error by @0-Blu  
Full Changelog: https://github.com/0-Blu/StikJIT/compare/1.3.1...1.3.2
apps.localizedDescription: Enable JIT capabilities for your sideloaded apps.

versions.localizedDescription: Bug fixes - no wifi error, make -9 error more clear, fix -17 error
Enhanced & Advanced: Improved performance: Fixes disk image unbounting in the background, DNS Blocker Check, UI tweaks: custom accent color picker, more logs.

Smooth Sailing: Improved performance: Prevented UI stutter in App List. UI tweaks: Light theme for notifications, better aligned UI elements, expanded theming support, fixed user feedback when get-task-allow is missing.
Bug fixes and UI improvements. Enhanced system log viewer and better error handling.

news.caption: Update of StikJIT just got released!
news.title: 1.3.2 - StikJIT 17/04/25
